channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260202)
item.description:
What's New

feat: Add search functionality to macro management

  • Add search field to filter macros by abbreviation or content
  • Show "Add macro" button when search yields no results
  • Auto-fill macro form with search text and scroll to form
  • Auto-focus content field after scrolling
  • Scroll to results section when typing in search

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
